I opened a PR to include the license file in the source distribution:
https://github.com/containers/podman-compose/pull/229

Maybe add a comment above the license file line as a reminder to check if it's included in a future release:

```yaml
...
# License file pulled in from separate source. See: https://github.com/containers/podman-compose/pull/229
license_file: LICENSE
```
added note in c2774af , with the thought that it being closer to the top that i'd be more likely to see it when a new release comes through...
Thanks -- I'll merge as soon as the CI finishes.
